transcripts.text: Charles Barkley.  What is with Charles Barkley?  Well, you know what?  I don't care.  I really honestly.  So Charles Barkley, who supported Doug Jones and the black vote, who comes back, he goes out on one of the Sirius XM shows, Schmuck Honish, and says the Democrats only talk to black folk every four years.  That's such bullshit.  That's what it is, Charles.  And I'm just as blunt as you are.  That's exactly what it is.  That's not true.  And all you have to do is look at the public policies that come out of.  Now, let's start with the Congressional Black Caucus.  Let's start with the eight.  By the way, let's start with the anti lynching laws.  Let's I mean, I could go.  Let's let's look at the budget.  Are you kidding me?
I would also suggest, I'm sorry to cut in.
I would also suggest, Mr.  Barkley, that you listen to the Madison Show.
Where Democrats are here year round.
All year round.  Year in, year out.
We've got audio files to prove it.  We replay them periodically.  Tune in.

He said Democrats only talk to black Americans when they want their vote.  Well, that's what all politicians do.  I mean, excuse me.  You don't think, wait, Republicans don't talk to Republicans when they want their vote?  Of course they do.  By the way, who is fighting gerrymandering?  Who is fighting voter suppression?  Who's going to court to make sure that the vote doesn't get suppressed?  And that didn't start this year.  I get so—you know what?  It just—and by the way, come on my show and sit down over here.  I'll play you Democrat after Democrat after Democrat.  Where do you want me to start?  You want me to start with Clyburn?  How about I bring the Elijah Cummings in?  How about I bring— Maxine Waters in here?  How about I bring the chairman of the Congressional Black Caucus in here?  How about I bring the chairman of the Homeland Security in here who talked to us all year round, Tom Perez?  Who?  Keep rolling.
What's his name out of Virginia?  Mark Warner.  Mark Warner.  Who's coming?
Yes, I mean, it goes on.
And so you know what bothers me?  And then he said when they get elected, they do nothing in the four years in between.
